title: BRIEF-Frost Bank Issues Statement On Unauthorized Access To Commercial Lockbox Image Archive
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:40 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Frost Bank Issues Statement On Unauthorized Access To Commercial Lockbox Image Archive Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Frost Bank * FROST BANK ISSUES STATEMENT REGARDING UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO COMMERCIAL LOCKBOX IMAGE ARCHIVE * FROST BANK - TO START BRIEFING COMMERCIAL LOCKBOX CUSTOMERS ABOUT UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO DIGITAL IMAGES STORED IN THEIR COMMERCIAL IMAGE ARCHIVES * FROST BANK - ‍IDENTIFIED INCIDENT DID NOT IMPACT OTHER FROST SYSTEMS ​ * FROST BANK- HAVE REPORTED INCIDENT TO, AND ARE COOPERATING WITH, LAW-ENFORCEMENT AUTHORITIES AND INVESTIGATION IS ONGOING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
